name: Escape From The USS Groundhog
description:
Your journey was over before it began... And now it has to end again just to start over.

The USS Groundhog has suffered tremendous damage. You have to get out before the ship is destroyed, but there's been too much damage - there's no getting out alive.  The best you can do is to leave as few clones of yourself behind as possible.

Use WASD and mouse to control. Press Escape to exit.

A game by:

  • Connor
  • Antonio
  • Roland
  • Schala
  • Tyler
  • Rick
